alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 30 at 3:49AM PST until February 02 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON ABOVE 5000 FEET IN THE WHITE MOUNTAINS AND ABOVE 5000 FEET IN ESMERALDA AND CENTRAL NYE COUNTIES... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 5000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches possible above 6000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In California, White Mountains of Inyo County. In Nevada, Esmeralda and Central Nye County. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult on Highways 168 and 266.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
